mapper.insert: insert into pathological( person_id, unique_id, unique_id_lv3, p900, patient_id, visit_id, pathology_no, inspect_time, reprot_time, specimen_name, tumor_location, if_original_location, pathological_type, differentiation_degree, if_involve_bronchus, if_invasion_pleura, if_artery, if_invasion_nerve, operation, lymph_node_partition, stage, stage_type, grade, grade_type, lymph_node_total, transfer_number, if_transfer, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{personId}, #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv3}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{pathologyNo}, #{inspectTime}, #{reprotTime}, #{specimenName}, #{tumorLocation}, #{ifOriginalLocation}, #{pathologicalType}, #{differentiationDegree}, #{ifInvolveBronchus}, #{ifInvasionPleura}, #{ifArtery}, #{ifInvasionNerve}, #{operation}, #{lymphNodePartition}, #{stage}, #{stageType}, #{grade}, #{gradeType}, #{lymphNodeTotal}, #{transferNumber}, #{ifTransfer}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update pathological set person_id = #{personId}, unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv3 = #{uniqueIdLv3}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, pathology_no = #{pathologyNo}, inspect_time = #{inspectTime}, reprot_time = #{reprotTime}, specimen_name = #{specimenName}, tumor_location = #{tumorLocation}, if_original_location = #{ifOriginalLocation}, pathological_type = #{pathologicalType}, differentiation_degree = #{differentiationDegree}, if_involve_bronchus = #{ifInvolveBronchus}, if_invasion_pleura = #{ifInvasionPleura}, if_artery = #{ifArtery}, if_invasion_nerve = #{ifInvasionNerve}, operation = #{operation}, lymph_node_partition = #{lymphNodePartition}, stage = #{stage}, stage_type = #{stageType}, grade = #{grade}, grade_type = #{gradeType}, lymph_node_total = #{lymphNodeTotal}, transfer_number = #{transferNumber}, if_transfer = #{ifTransfer}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
